assetProfile.address2: 6th Floor Senapati Bapat Marg Lower Parel
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: DCB Bank Limited provides various banking and financial products and services in India. It operates through Treasury Operations, Corporate/Wholesale Banking, Retail Banking, and Other Banking Operations segments. The company's deposit products includes current and saving, NRI, recurring, and fixed deposit accounts; and offers ATM, debit, and travel smart cards, and payment services including bill and utility payment, remittances, tax payment, and POS terminal services, as well as IMPS, RTGS, NEFT, and UPI services. In addition, it provides secured lending services, which includes home and auto loans, loan against property, co-lending, commercial vehicle, construction equipment and finance, dealer trade advances, kisan credit card, school and retail microfinance, and gold, tractor, and term loans, as well as trade receivable discounting system and ODTD services. The company also offers corporate banking services comprising trade current accounts, foreign exchange, guarantee, import and export, letter of credit, supply chain, bill collection, and invoice discounting services; and capital management services, such as working capital and cash management services. Further, it distributes life, general and health insurances, and mutual funds; and other services, which includes locker facility and ASBA online services. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
